text: Tini khumti byatita akasamandali srsti karechena; tomara ta dekhacha. Tini prthibite sthapana karechena parbatamala, yate prthibi tomaderake niye dhale na pare ebam ete chariye diyechena sarbaprakara jantu. Ami akasa theke pani barsana karechi, atahpara tate udagata karechi sarbaprakara kalyanakara udbhidaraji.
